content: --पः (पी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {1} a turtle, tortoise; केशव धृतकच्छपरूप जय जगदीश हरे <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 1. 44</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 42</ls> (thus explained by Durga; कच्छं आत्मनो मुखसंपुटं पाति, स हि किंचित् दृष्ट्वा शरीर एव मुखसंपुटं प्रवेशयति). {2} a tumour on the palate. {3} an apparatus used in the distillation of spirituous liquor. {4} an attitude in wrestling. {5} the tree Cedrela Toona. {6} one of the nine treasures of Kubera. (--पी {1} a female tortoise. {2} a cutaneous disease, wart or blotch. {3} a kind of lute; also the lute of Sarasvatī.
